title: Slow cooker shredded pork
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning', '1 (1.35kg) pork shoulder joint', '1 (290g) peperoncini, undrained or to taste', '2 teaspoons adobo sauce (from tinned chipotle chillies)', '1 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic', '25g fresh coriander leaves', '950ml water, to cover']
